title: Complete Transition Plan Credibility Assessment
description: Comprehensive questionnaire for evaluating organizational transition plans

sections.title: Section 1 - Red Flag Questions
sections.description: Critical questions that can override all other scores

questions.question_text: Does the transition plan include a clear timeline with specific milestones?
Are key stakeholders clearly identified and engaged in the transition process?
Is there evidence of leadership commitment and support for the transition?

sections.title: Section 2 - Accountability
sections.description: Questions that determine the base credibility score

questions.question_text: Are roles and responsibilities clearly defined for all team members?
Is there a designated transition leader or team responsible for oversight?
Are accountability mechanisms and reporting structures established?
Is there a process for monitoring progress and making adjustments?

sections.title: Section 3 - Depth
sections.description: Questions assessing the thoroughness of the transition plan

questions.question_text: Does the plan include detailed risk assessment and mitigation strategies?
Are resource requirements clearly identified and allocated?
Is there evidence of stakeholder analysis and engagement planning?

sections.title: Section 4 - Action
sections.description: Questions evaluating actionable elements of the transition plan

questions.question_text: Are specific actions and tasks clearly outlined with deadlines?
Is there evidence of implementation planning and execution strategies?
Are success metrics and evaluation criteria defined?
